DOC.criteria: Healthy adult 2045 year age Weight ≥ 60kg ≤ 90kg BMI ≥ 19 < 27 ( BMI ( kg/m2 ) = weight ( kg ) / { height ( ) } 2 Voluntary write informed consent History presence significant renal , neurologic , pulmonary , endocrine , hematology , oncology , urologic , cardiovascular , musculoskeletal psychiatric disease Drug allergies Voriconazole Recent history evidence drug abuse Recent participation ( within 2 month ) clinical study Recent donation blood ( within 2months ) , plasma ( within 1month ) transfusion ( within 1month )
